texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["You can view, add and/or remove vehicles from your Fleet Auto Pay service."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
More information is in the Fleet Auto Pay user guide.
You can't add or remove vehicles until your service is reactivated

Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today, you don't have to pay the ULEZ charge for this vehicle. This may change - always check to see if you need to pay to drive within the zone.
This vehicle does not meet the ULEZ emissions standards. You need to pay the ULEZ charge if you travel within the zone. The zone operates at all times - charging days run from midnight to midnight.
This vehicle does not meet the ULEZ emissions standards. You need to pay the ULEZ charge if you travel within the zone. The zone operates at all times - charging days run from midnight to midnight.

Based on the vehicle details entered and information held by the DVLA and TfL today, this vehicle is exempt from this charge. This may change - always check to see if you need to pay to drive within the zone.
This vehicle meets the ULEZ emissions standards. You don't have to pay the charge.
You need to pay the Congestion Charge for this vehicle if you travel within the zone Monday to Friday 07:00-18:00 excluding bank holidays and the period between Christmas Day and New Year's Day.
There was a problem - we can't retrieve your vehicles.
A tag will help you identify your vehicle more easily.
Change your vehicle tag or remove it.
If you remove the vehicle from your Auto Pay service it will cost £10 to add it again.
You need a minimum of 6 vehicles on Fleet Auto Pay. Add another vehicle first.
